Restoring Shared Secrets Like Passwords

Shares data:

Shamir's Secret Sharing, GF256 with polynomial 0x11b, utf-8, lower-endian bytes, first byte of share is the share's x value, secret possibly padded with trailing zeros, share verification SHA3-256 hash of unpadded secret, generated UUID, timestamp ISO 8601 like 2009-06-30T18:30:00+02:00.
